{{- range $image, $info := .Site.Data.registry -}} {{- if and (isset $info "versions-dedicated-gen-3") (ne $image "redis-persistent") (ne $image "mysql") (ne $image "elasticsearch") -}} {{- $label := index $info "name" -}} {{- $versions := index ( index $info "versions-dedicated-gen-3") "supported" -}} {{- $docs_link := index (index $info "docs") "url" -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}}
Service Supported versions
{{ $label }} {{- $service_versions := "" -}} {{- range $versions -}} {{- if eq ( len $service_versions ) 0 -}} {{- $service_versions = printf "%s%s" $service_versions . -}} {{- else -}} {{- $service_versions = printf "%s, %s" $service_versions . -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}} {{ $service_versions }}
